name: Captain Pengoon vs. The Trash Pirates
name_original: Captain Pengoon vs. The Trash Pirates
description:
Description:
Captain Pengoon must save the seas by stopping the filthy polluting Trash Pirates.

Controls
Keyboard:

  • AWSD to Move
  • Space / Left Mouse to Flap

Controller:

  • Left Analog to Move
  • A button / South Button to Flap

Credits

Programing & Art by KR34T1VE
Music by AdhesiveWombat https://soundcloud.com/adhesivewombat

Note
To fix resolution zoom out by ctrl + scroll wheel
